targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  wind_offshore AS "ENTSO-E Offshore",
  wind_onshore AS "ENTSO-E Onshore"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  index as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join (SELECT
  "TimeStep" as "time",
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.VariableRenewableOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology like '%wind%'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(solar) AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.VariableRenewableOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology = 'solar'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  --simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  "biomass" AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  index as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join (SELECT
  "TimeStep" as "time",
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.Biogas
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology = 'biomass'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  ("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+hydro_water_reservoir) AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
--avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  index as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join (SELECT
  "TimeStep" as "time",
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.VariableRenewableOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology = 'hydro'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  ("fossil_brown_coal/lignite") AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select a."time",
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference",
a.technology
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
c.simulation,
c.technology
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1
) q
join power_plant_meta c on q.unit = c.index and c.simulation=q.simulation
group by 1, agent, c.technology, c.simulation) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
where a.technology = 'lignite'
GROUP BY 1, a.agent, a.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  nuclear AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select a."time",
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference",
a.technology
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
c.simulation,
c.technology
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1
) q
join power_plant_meta c on q.unit = c.index and c.simulation=q.simulation
where c.technology = 'nuclear'
group by 1, agent, c.technology, c.simulation) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

GROUP BY 1, a.agent, a.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_oil AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select a."time",
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference",
a.technology
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
c.simulation,
c.technology
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1
) q
join power_plant_meta c on q.unit = c.index and c.simulation=q.simulation
where c.technology = 'oil'
group by 1, agent, c.technology, c.simulation) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

GROUP BY 1, a.agent, a.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_hard_coal AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select a."time",
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference",
a.technology
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
c.simulation,
c.technology
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1
) q
join power_plant_meta c on q.unit = c.index and c.simulation=q.simulation
where c.technology = 'hard coal'
group by 1, agent, c.technology, c.simulation) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

GROUP BY 1, a.agent, a.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_gas AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select a."time",
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference",
a.technology
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
c.simulation,
c.technology
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1
) q
join power_plant_meta c on q.unit = c.index and c.simulation=q.simulation
where c.technology = 'natural gas'
group by 1, agent, c.technology, c.simulation) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

GROUP BY 1, a.agent, a.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  --"AgentId"::text as "agent",
  --avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("OfferedChargePriceInEURperMWH") as "OfferedChargePriceInEURperMWH",
  --avg("OfferedDischargePriceInEURperMWH") as "OfferedDischargePriceInEURperMWH",
  avg("AwardedDischargeEnergyInMWH")-avg("AwardedChargeEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Storage Dispatch",
  avg("StoredEnergyInMWH")*1e3 as "AMIRIS StoredEnergyInMWH"
FROM $scenario.StorageTrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  soc AS "State of Charge"
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$scenario' and
  unit like 'StorageTrader%'
GROUP BY 1, SOC
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  hydro_pumped_storage AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  (biomass+solar+"fossil_gas"+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite"+"fossil_oil"+"fossil_hard_coal"+geothermal+other+waste+"wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore"+nuclear)*1e3 as total_entsoe
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  nuclear*1e3 as nuclear,
  "fossil_hard_coal"*1e3 as coal,
  ("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+hydro_water_reservoir)*1e3 as water,
  biomass*1e3 as bio,
  ("fossil_coal-derived_gas"+"fossil_gas")*1e3 as gas,
  (fossil_oil+coalesce(fossil_oil_shale,0)+coalesce(fossil_peat,0)+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite")*1e3 as lignite,
  ("wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore")*1e3 as wind,
  solar*1e3 as solar,
  (geothermal+other+waste)*1e3 as others
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  biomass,
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  fossil_gas,
  fossil_hard_coal,
  fossil_oil,
  fossil_oil_shale,
  fossil_peat,
  geothermal,
  hydro_pumped_storage,
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  nuclear,
  wind_offshore,
  wind_onshore,
  solar
FROM query_installed_generation_capacity
WHERE
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg("0") AS "ENTSO-E price"
FROM query_day_ahead_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("product_start",$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "ASSUME Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$scenario') AND market_id = 'Market_1' AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  avg("ElectricityPriceInEURperMWH") as "AMIRIS Price"
FROM $scenario.DayAheadMarketSingleZone
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(actual_load) AS "Historical Demand"
FROM query_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  -avg(power) AS "ASSUME Market Dispatch"
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit_id = 'demand_100_0'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Market Dispatch"
FROM $scenario.demandtrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index, $__interval),
  avg(
    biomass + solar + "fossil_gas" + coalesce("fossil_brown_coal/lignite",0) + coalesce("fossil_oil",0) + "fossil_hard_coal" + geothermal + other + waste + coalesce("wind_offshore",0) + "wind_onshore" + coalesce(nuclear,0)
  ) as "ENTSO-E Generation"
FROM
  query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
  AND country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY
  1
ORDER BY
  1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
avg("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
a."agent"
from
(SELECT
  index as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent"
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1) a
join (SELECT
  "TimeStep" as "time",
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.VariableRenewableOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time
--where a.agent = '10'
GROUP BY 1, a."agent"

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

select "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
"AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
"AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch" as "Difference", 
a."time", a."agent"
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent"
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) q
group by 1, agent) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent"
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) q
group by 1, agent

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Detail Views - Left ASSUME - Right AMIRIS

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  avg(demand_volume)*1e3 AS "Demand volume",
  avg(price) AS "Price",
  avg(supply_volume)*1e3 AS "Supply volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$scenario') AND market_id = 'Market_1' AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Market Summary ASSUME

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

select "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
"AMIRIS Awarded Energy",
"AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch" as "Difference", 
a."time", a."agent"
from
(select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent"
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) q
group by 1, agent) a
join (SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1) b on a.agent=b.agent and a.time=b.time

select
time,
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
SUBSTRING(unit,27,1) as "agent",
SUBSTRING(unit,29) as "nr"
from
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) q
where SUBSTRING(unit,27,1)='1'
group by 1, agent, nr

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  substring("AgentId"::text,3) as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH") as "AMIRIS Awarded Energy"
  --avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  --avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "Market dispatch",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit_id = 'demand_100_0'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit = 'demand_100_0'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("ElectricityPriceInEURperMWH") as "ElectricityPriceInEURperMWH",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("DispatchSystemCostInEUR") as "DispatchSystemCostInEUR"
  
FROM $scenario.DayAheadMarketSingleZone
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  left(unit_id, 27) as unit,
  avg(power) AS "Market dispatch"
  
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit_id like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "Actual dispatch",
  left(unit, 27) as unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'PredefinedPlantBuilder_200%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  -avg("RequestedEnergyInMWH")*1e3 as "RequestedEnergyInMWH",
  -avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH")*1e3 as "AwardedEnergyInMWH"
FROM $scenario.demandtrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "Market dispatch",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit_id like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario' AND
  unit like 'VariableRenewableOperator_%'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyForecastInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyForecastInMWH",
  avg("ElectricityPriceForecastInEURperMWH") as "ElectricityPriceForecastInEURperMWH"
FROM $scenario.meritorderforecaster
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  --avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR",
  avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR"
FROM $scenario.VariableRenewableOperator
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  "ID",
  avg("DispatchedEnergyInMWHperPlant"*1e3) as "DispatchedEnergyInMWHperPlant"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator_DispatchedEnergyInMWHperPlant
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent", "ID"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedChargePriceInEURperMWH") as "OfferedChargePriceInEURperMWH",
  avg("OfferedDischargePriceInEURperMWH") as "OfferedDischargePriceInEURperMWH",
  avg("AwardedChargeEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedChargeEnergyInMWH",
  avg("AwardedDischargeEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedDischargeEnergyInMWH",
  avg("StoredEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "StoredEnergyInMWH",
  avg("VariableCostsInEUR") as "VariableCostsInEUR",
  avg("ReceivedMoneyInEUR") as "ReceivedMoneyInEUR"
FROM $scenario.StorageTrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  "ID",
  avg("VariableCostsInEURperPlant") as "VariableCostsInEURperPlant"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator_VariableCostsInEURperPlant
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent", "ID"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("ReceivedSupportInEUR") as "ReceivedSupportInEUR",
  avg("RefundedSupportInEUR") as "RefundedSupportInEUR",
  avg("ReceivedMarketRevenues") as "ReceivedMarketRevenuesInEUR",
  avg("TrueGenerationPotentialInMWH"*1e3) as "TrueGenerationPotentialInMWH"
FROM $scenario.SystemOperatorTrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("index",$__interval),
  avg(biomass) as biomass,
  avg(fossil_hard_coal) as fossil_hard_coal,
  avg(geothermal) as geothermal,
  avg(nuclear) as nuclear,
  avg("fossil_brown_coal/lignite") as "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  avg("fossil_coal-derived_gas") as "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  avg("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage") as "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  avg(waste) as waste,
  avg(solar) as solar,
  avg(wind_offshore) as wind_offshore,
  avg(wind_onshore) as wind_onshore,
  avg(other_renewable) as other_renewable,
  avg(hydro_water_reservoir) as hydro_water_reservoir,
  avg(fossil_gas) as fossil_gas
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
group by 1
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  avg("AwardedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "AwardedEnergyInMWH",
  avg("OfferedEnergyInMWH"*1e3) as "OfferedEnergyInMWH"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalTrader
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("TimeStep",$__interval),
  "AgentId"::text as "agent",
  "ID",
  avg("ReceivedMoneyInEURperPlant") as "ReceivedMoneyInEURperPlant"
FROM $scenario.ConventionalPlantOperator_ReceivedMoneyInEURperPlant
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("TimeStep")
GROUP BY 1, "agent", "ID"
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
select schema_name
from information_schema.schemata
where schema_name like 'amiris_%'
list.description: filters amiris scenarios by schema name
list.name: scenario
list.query:
select schema_name
from information_schema.schemata
where schema_name like 'amiris_%'
